name: Hentai Match 3
description:
Hentai Match 3 is a unique combination of the "three in a row" gameplay with hot anime girls!

Match candies, complete goals and unlock unlimited variations of girls. Each girl can be undressed and examined. Sell their underwear to buy upgrades and complete harder goals. Or just play with collected girls in any way you want. They are created for your pleasure!

  • Unlimited anime girls with hot outfits
  • Possibility to undress every girl
  • Dozens of collectable emotes and upgrades in the shop
  • Four game modes with various goals and rewards
  • The most enjoyable "three in a row" gameplay
  • Fancy graphics and sweet sounds

Hentai Match 3 is a game for your pleasure and relaxation. Swipe and match candies, collect girls and enjoy their hot bodies!
